item.title: Education
item.description: Jan. 2019 - Present PhD student in Technical Sciences: Computer Science, from Johannes Kepler University in Linz-Austria Sep. 2017 - July 2018 Master’s of Science: Informatics:- Engineering Management, from Johannes Kepler University in Linz-Austria Sep. 2012 - July 2017 Bachelor’s degree in Media and Engineering Technology: Computer Science, from the German University in Cairo-Egypt
item.content:
Jan. 2019 - Present

PhD student in Technical Sciences: Computer Science, from Johannes Kepler University in Linz-Austria

Sep. 2017 - July 2018

Master’s of Science: Informatics:- Engineering Management, from Johannes Kepler University in Linz-Austria

Sep. 2012 - July 2017

Bachelor’s degree in Media and Engineering Technology: Computer Science, from the German University in Cairo-Egypt

item.title: Internships
item.description: Jun. 2016 - Aug. 2016 Gaitech Technology Company in Shanghai-China Building the company’s Educational website for Turtlebot robot and Drones. Developing new tutorials for the Turtlebot robot. May 2015 - Aug. 2015 Prince Sultan University in Riyadh-KSA Integrating ROS Hydro and ROS Indigo versions with Arduino Developing an application to control a Turtlebot Arm with an Arduino Ultrasonic Sensor Developing an application to control a Turtlebot Arm with an Arduino RFID Investigating the integration of the Turtlebot arm with moveit!
item.content:
Jun. 2016 - Aug. 2016

Gaitech Technology Company in Shanghai-China

  • Building the company’s Educational website for Turtlebot robot and Drones.
  • Developing new tutorials for the Turtlebot robot.

May 2015 - Aug. 2015

Prince Sultan University in Riyadh-KSA

  • Integrating ROS Hydro and ROS Indigo versions with Arduino
  • Developing an application to control a Turtlebot Arm with an Arduino Ultrasonic Sensor
  • Developing an application to control a Turtlebot Arm with an Arduino RFID
  • Investigating the integration of the Turtlebot arm with moveit!

Jan. 2015 - Feb. 2015

Prince Sultan University in Riyadh-KSA

  • Connecting an ultrasonic sensor with the arduino robot and implementing an arduino program to detect and avoid obstacles.
  • Investigating the AscTech FireFly Drone and applications with its camera
  • AscTech FireFly Drone field testing

Jan. 2014 - Feb. 2014

Prince Sultan University in Riyadh-KSA

  • Developing an arduino program for the PhantomX Pincher Robot Arm to carry a water bottle from one location to another.

Feb. 2017 - May 2017

German University in Cairo-Egypt

  • Junior teaching assistant at the German University in Cairo for Software Engineering course.

Oct. 2015 - Jan. 2016

German University in Cairo-Egypt

  • Junior teaching assistant at the German University in Cairo for ComputerScience102 course.

item.title: Research & Publications
item.description: Research Oct. 2017 - July 2018 Master thesis entitled: ”A Smart Network for Marketing Solutions”, a model of a smart network is established using different IoT devices connected to different sensors and communicating through a wired network creating a bus system to handle communication between smart devices and a main server. A prototype was successfully deployed with the Umdasch Digital Retail company. The smart device that was used is a Raspberry Pi 3 (model B) programmed in Python connected to different sensors.
item.content:
Research

  • Oct. 2017 - July 2018

    Master thesis entitled: ”A Smart Network for Marketing Solutions”, a model of a smart network is established using different IoT devices connected to different sensors and communicating through a wired network creating a bus system to handle communication between smart devices and a main server. A prototype was successfully deployed with the Umdasch Digital Retail company. The smart device that was used is a Raspberry Pi 3 (model B) programmed in Python connected to different sensors. The main server was a web server programmed in Java. The server handled receiving the data from the smart devices, inserting into a database and creating events based on that data. Other smart devices listen to the events and take actions accordingly.

  • Jan. 2016 - June 2016

    Bachelor thesis entitled: ”A Cloud-Based Person Activity Monitoring System using Participatory Sensing”, a model of a smart room is established using different IoT devices connected to different sensors and communicating through a wireless network to monitor temperature, humidity, light, gas and door status. A prototype was deployed in a lab in PSU university. The IoT devices that were used are Arduino boards programmed using Arduino IDE and Raspberry Pi (model B+) programmed in Python. The PubNub IoT platform was used to manage the stream of sensor data in real-time from all the sensor nodes to a responsive web interface. The prototype was successfully deployed for several days at the lab in PSU university.

Publications

  • Ahmad, A., Haslgrübler, M., Ferscha, A., Ettinger, B., Cho, J. (2020, June). Macroworkstep detection for assembly manufacturing. In Proceedings of the 13th ACMInternational Conference on Pervasive Technologies Related to Assistive Environments(pp. 1-6).

  • Murauer, Michaela, et al., A task-independent design and development process for cognitive products in industrial applications. Proceedings of the 12th ACM International Conference on PErvasive Technologies Related to Assistive Environments. 2019.

  • Anis Koubaa, Mohamed Foued Sriti, Yasir Javed, Maram Alajlan, Basit Qureshi, Fatma Ellouze, Abdelrahman Mahmoud, MyBot: Cloud-Based Service Robot using Service Oriented Architecture, PUBLINDUSTRIA (robotica; vol.107, 8-13), Porto, Portugal, 2017.

  • Anis Koubaa, Mohamed-Foued Sriti, Yasir Javed, Maram Alajlan, Basit Qureshi, Fatma Ellouze, Abdelrahman Mahmoud, Turtlebot at Office: A Service-Oriented Software Architecture for Personal Assistant Robots using ROS, submitted IEEE International Conference on Robotics and Automation (ICRA 2016), Stockholm, Sweden, May 16-21.
